about_the_game:
Adds two new characters to the base game, complete with their own stories that may have a deeper connection to the world of Promethia than anyone realizes.

They are glow-in-the-dark dragons. That's cool, right? That's super cool.

  • Two new characters that you can add to your collection of anthro waifus and husbandos.
  • Adds a new dimension to the existing story, and fleshes out some of the bigger mysteries of the world.

Requires a new game for the content to load.
detailed_description:

  • Adds a new dimension to the existing story, and fleshes out some of the bigger mysteries of the world.

Requires a new game for the content to load.
